lines.text: Why you dirty, ungrateful little greaseball!
Wait a minute! That's one thing I don't take from nobody! Nobody!
Say, listen, this is Center Street, not Hollywood.
Tonight you're going to step out and make some whooppee.
The cops'll tell you I'm a crook, a mug, a no-good guy.
All my life I've been wanting to meet a man named Snell.
I wouldn't dream of doing such a thing.
If I had a dollar for every time I've heard that.
My mother told me never to cross state lines without benefit of clergy.
